summary: ForeverRaw – relationship communication app with dark mythical dragon aesthetic. Free tier: unlimited chat + 10 scans/day. Pro tier: unlimited scans + therapist tools. Main features: gut punch chat, conversation/profile scanning, consultant mode, safe draft, console, therapist mode.
architectural_notes: Free tier: Unlimited chat + 10 scans per day
Pro tier: Unlimited scans + full therapist/client tools
Chat is the main/host screen at all times
Navigation via left side menu (swipe or hamburger)
Design: Deep black/charcoal background, blood-red and ember-orange accents, cracked stone and dragon-scale textures
Gargoyle Dragon as central visual throughout
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Gargoyle Dragon with wings spread and glowing eyes for background, dark mythical style, suitable for hero section (gargoyle-dragon-hero.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Gargoyle Dragon logo icon version for header/branding, dark background with red/orange accents (gargoyle-dragon-logo.dim_256x256.png)
- Forged metal or burning stone texture for button background, dark with ember glow (button-texture.dim_400x120.png)
- Cracked stone texture overlay, subtle, tileable, dark (stone-texture.dim_512x512.png)
- Dragon scale texture overlay, subtle, tileable, dark (dragon-scale-texture.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Implement dark, heavy, mythical theme with deep black/charcoal background, blood-red (#FF0000) and ember-orange (#FF4500) accents, and faint cracked stone and dragon-scale textures throughout the application
Replace existing navigation structure with a left side menu (swipe or hamburger) containing items in this exact order: Chat, Scan, Consultant, Safe Draft, Console, Profile, Upgrade to Pro

Transform home/chat screen to display large Gargoyle Dragon background with wings spread and glowing eyes, big glowing blood-red text saying 'Ready to Punch?', prominent 'START A GUT PUNCH' button styled like forged metal or burning stone, bottom input field with placeholder 'Type your punch…', and clear scan count display showing 'Scans left: 10/10' for free tier or 'Unlimited' for Pro
Update scan screen to display 'Scan a Convo or Profile' heading and show 'Scan Limit Reached – Upgrade to Pro for Unlimited' message after 10 scans are used on free tier
Create therapist/Pro mode interface with calmer dragon aesthetic, focused design, and tools including session notes, resolution guidance, and session management features

Update all user-facing text and messaging to use raw, direct language including phrases 'Punch through the bullshit', 'The Dragon guards your truth', 'No filters. No games', and eliminate all corporate or overly polished language
Update branding throughout application from 'GUT-PUNCH' to 'ForeverRaw – Home of the Gargoyle Dragon', ensuring the Gargoyle Dragon is the central visual element on all screens
